channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Oskia Skincare with Ali Young
channel.desc: Boost your skin's vitality with Oskia and Ali Young. Discover UK-made, nutritionally advanced skincare blending nature and innovation for visible results.

channel.title: Best Of QVC Beauty

channel.title: Aveda
channel.desc: For more than two decades, Aveda has combined nature and science to create pure plant and flower-based products for your hair.
